attributes.action: PTSD treatment for serving and ex serving military personnel.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned ask that the MOD reviews and replaces it's present system for the diagnoses and treatment for PTSD.
The treatment should be available to all serving and ex-service personnel.
Medical records of all personnel discharged from the military should be made available to GPs at time of discharge, and that said GP records should be annotated with Veteran/ex-services so that follow up of sufferers and potential sufferers is made easier.
Potential costs for treatment and diagnoses should be met by the Govt Dept responsible.
